title: Elegant, second floor 1BR/1BA on Russian Hill(2700 Polk #6)
posting_body: ['2nd', 'Floor 1BR/1BA', '* $3,150/month annual lease', '* Breakfast nook', '* Shared laundry', "* Parking at an add'l fee", '*', 'Available:', 'Now', 'OPEN HOUSE: Please call', 'show contact info', 'Address: 2700 Polk #6', 'Elegant, second floor 1BR/1BA on Russian Hill.', 'Bright apartment has hardwood floors throughout except in bath.', 'Apartment is classic San Francisco style with original detail.', 'Apartment has three large closets; living room and bedroom have huge walk-through closets.', 'Living room is adjacent to the galley-style kitchen.', 'Kitchen includes a gas stove and microwave.', 'There is space for a breakfast nook at the far end of the kitchen, in front of a window where kitchen connects to living room.', 'Central hallway has a large walk-in closet.', 'Standard bath has shower-over-tub.', 'Building is on Polk Street at Lombard, is lovely and well up kept.', 'It has a shared, coin-operated laundry.', 'Walk Score is 95, Transit Score is 93.', "Building is within walking distance of Polk Street's shopping and dining district.", 'Bus lines 19, 30, 41, 47 and 49 are within easy walking distance.', 'Silicon Valley shuttles are one block away on Van Ness Avenue.', "Tenant pays a one-time broker's fee.", 'Everest Mwamba', 'DRE# 01717299', 'Kenney & Everest Real Estate', 'DRE# 01984640', 'show contact info', 'office', 'Apply at: <URL>', 'Leasing and Real Estate: Our Family Business for Over 100 Years.', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.']
